text:
@PressSec @mattgaetz @realDonaldTrump April 16, 135 Days since Trump was briefed on the deadly nature of Covid-19 + still we have no
*Tests
*Masks
*PPE
*National Strategy
Everyone else's fault but his. As States scramble for equipment, he sends our ventilators to Russia. 
The new @PressSec is just like the old: LIES.
